Events that occurred on 19 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1899 - Nevill Coghill, Inkling, is born.
1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien, in revalidation, is assigned to the Humber Garrison, but is not fit enough.
1966 - Rayner Unwin writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Eva Heilborn.
1981 - The seventh episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1995 - Actor Patrick Gibson is born.
2009 - The first e-Book editions of The Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit and The Children of HÃºrin are published.
2012 - Tolkien in East Yorkshire 1917 - 1918 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
